column4: im trying to create a new partition on free space I have can someone help me?

can i use this setup for partitioning free space to install my ubuntu?:   Type for the new partition: Primary;  Location for the new partition: Beginning;  Use as: Ext3 journaling file system;  Mount point:  /home    ???
Can someone plz help me with partitioning during my ubuntu 8.04 installation :(  ???
you'll need at least two partitions. one for the root filesystem, the other for swap
i like to add another for /home, maybe one more for /boot, depending
